title: Defying the Odds
description: Franklin ‘The Beast’ Goodman was known as a player in high school, a reputation that has followed him to college. All the girls want him, and he’ll take what he wants when it’s offered. But when he meets Marley, he may have finally met his match.Marley Richards’ parents want her to become a lawyer, like them. But she has other ideas. Becoming a nurse is something she’s always dreamed of, and parties and guys aren’t on her radar. Somehow though she catches the eye of The Beast and he’s relentless. Even she can’t deny there is a spark between them.Defying the odds could lead them both down a path they didn’t expect. With secrets and dishonesty that could destroy them both.**This book is intended for mature readers only. Some readers may find some content of the story triggering. The story includes one scene of MFF and a mention of drugs.**
author: S.  Lucas
